attributes.action: call a general election on before standing down.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: when tony blair stands down i believe that the country should hold a general election rather than except g. brown as prime minister. tony blair was elected to the post and knowone else. though new prime ministers have been created this way in the past it should only happen in the future if a serving prime minister was to pass away (or becomes medically incapable to hold office) and not simply step down.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
